```{r mle}
loglik_binom <- function(psi, x, n){
if(psi < 0 | psi > 1)
return(NA)
else {
pi <- (1-psi)/(2-psi)
return(log(choose(1000,50))+(x*log(pi))+((170-x)*log(1-pi)))
  }
}
maxLik(logLik = loglik_binom, start = 0.55,
method = "NR", tol = 1e-4,
x = 8, n = 170)
```
